title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 261 - Accounting Periods And Methods
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 261 - Accounting Periods And Methods

State Regulations

Accounting Periods (§ 261.1 to 261.4)

Accounting Methods (§ 261.10 to 261.13)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 261

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 697[a], 1342; Codes
and Ordinances of the City of Yonkers, §
92-113

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
